basic_node.title: Distance between sensor and object
basic_node.description: Spatial distance between LIDAR sensor and object.
basic_node.references: [sp42, http://link.springer.com/10.1007/0-387-25101-4_4, Lidar Equation: Geometric factor G(R): Overlap function O(R); p.8/p.9/p.109] [sp42, https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/document/9127841/]
